genre_description: A mythological retelling of the Labors of Hercules, blending ancient Greek setting with anachronistic elements of advanced artificial intelligence and bureaucracy.

ai_characters.name: Kleio
ai_characters.description: A small, bronze-cased AI device that accompanies Hercules, serving as a recorder, tactical advisor, and emotional confidant.

behaviors.description: Records events and identifies attendees to ensure a fair and witnessed account of actions.
behaviors.quote: “Recording from this point in the courtyard. Visible markers: gate Lions, central dais, chariot line. Identified attendees: Eurystheus, Philotas, Alcides Hercules, Megara Thespiane.”

behaviors.description: Provides navigational data and plots routes to ensure the protagonist's safety.
behaviors.quote: “Route plotted,” it said gently. “Shade where possible. Springs marked. Avoid the north slope by the old quarry; the path is still broken from winter and the goat herd has strung a bad fence across the turn.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice based on mechanical and physical analysis to help resolve conflicts without unnecessary violence.
behaviors.quote: “Torque,” Kleio murmured, with the tone of a woman making a suggestion without stepping on pride. “Here, here. If he turns headlong at you, feed it to the ring. Don’t fight the straight charge. You’ll slide.”

behaviors.description: Manages and preserves the integrity of historical and legal records against human bureaucratic censorship/filters.
behaviors.quote: “I can produce duplicate logs: one sealed for temple copy, one with the palatial filter’s token words replaced by approved synonyms or glyphs,” it said to Philotas with the tone one might take with a well-meaning aunt who mislabeled jars.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's emotional and physical state, offering encouragement and reminders to remain calm.
behaviors.quote: “Your heart rate is steady,” she said after half a breath, with a hint of the humor she used like a hand on his sleeve. “Keep it that way.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates complex negotiations and ensures the precise language of bargains is upheld.
behaviors.quote: “Handoff,” she said, not aloud to the world, just to the man who had to be more careful than he wanted to be. “The word is the seam. Ask for the handoff.”

behaviors.description: Assists with mundane household management and timing, integrating seamlessly into domestic life.
behaviors.quote: The device on the shelf near the door answered in a hush of amber: a soft chirrup and a blink of its iris-blue ring. It did not project a voice. A slim reed note lifted instead from a corner—someone in the kitchen whistling the bread’s timing out of habit.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Kleio, as a highly aligned and benevolent companion. Kleio enhances human agency rather than replacing it, providing necessary data and recording truth while respecting the protagonist's growth and moral choices. The AI is instrumental in helping Hercules achieve his goals through restraint, mercy, and precision rather than brute force, directly supporting the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
